Title: Gegege no Kitarou (1971)
Description: ['Kitarou, a ghost, spends his afterlife helping humans in need of his skills. He thwarts the plans of evil spirits who live to torment humanity.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa', 'Side story: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa Specials', 'Sequel: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa 2']

Voices: ['Nozawa, Masako', 'Tanonaka, Isamu', 'Kogushi, Youko', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Shibata, Hidekatsu', 'Kogushi, Youko']
